summary: An internal email forwarding a status memo on the Epstein investigation, emphasizing the need for confidentiality and describing the investigation as covert. The memo itself is attached but not included in this text.

persons.name: Iris
persons.context: Mentioned as the person the sender was waiting to hear back from regarding addressees for the attached memo before forwarding the update.

events.title: Epstein Investigation Status Update Forwarded
events.description: An email is sent forwarding an attached status memo on the progress of the Jeffrey Epstein investigation, with instructions to keep it confidential.

keyFacts: An internal status memo on the Epstein investigation was circulated on or about May 15, 2019.
The investigation was described as sensitive and efforts were to remain 'covert'.
The memo's distribution list (addressees) was being finalized with input from a person named Iris.
